articles.description: Ex-PBKS all-rounder Harpreet Brar has gone viral once again, but this time for his off the field antics. Brar shared a unique selfie with American pop star Ariana Grande.

articles.title: Kentucky tornado sends photo more than 200km across US - ABC News
articles.description: An American woman finds a photograph on her windshield sent hundreds of kilometres on the back of monstrous winds.
articles.content:

articles.author: Allison Morrow, CNN Business
articles.title: Who's to blame for inflation? It's complicated - CNN
articles.description: President Joe Biden and other politicians will tell you inflation is Corporate America's fault. Corporate America blames the administration's pandemic assistance programs for putting too much cash into the economy.

articles.title: Powerful tornadoes kill more than 80 in six US states - News24
articles.description: Dozens of devastating tornadoes roared through six US states overnight, leaving more than 80 people dead and dozens missing Saturday in what President Joe Biden said was likely to be "one of the largest" storm outbreaks in American history.
